attributes.action: Start the humanitarian mission in Iran.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise that the Iranian election is no longer a political issue but a humanitarian one.  Reports are coming in that there has been a massacre across Tehran, against people using their constitutional right of protest.  Britain has already been singled out at the enemy of this regime, thus nothing can be gained by keeping quiet.  We must act to help the Millions of Iranians in danger.
